biotools.summary: Online resource to predict associations between disease phenotypes and gene sets. Its algorithms combine known disease-gene associations in OMIM with the topological information in the disease phenotype similarity network and the gene-gene interaction network to analyze the association between a gene set and disease phenotypes.

bioschemas.name: rcNet
